name: Speed Driver
overview:
" Speed ​​Driver " is a racing game series for arcades sold by IGS, a game company in the Republic of China ( Taiwan ), and operating in the same area. As of 2019, it is not exported or sold to Japan.

A racing game based on IGS's original IP. Inspired by the Japanese arcade racing games " Initial D ARCADE STAGE Series " and " Wangan Midnight MAXIMUM TUNE Series ", the game design is similar to those, but books such as the adoption of Nitro. It also has elements unique to the work.

All of the recorded vehicles have the motif of an existing vehicle, but the vehicle name is fictitious because it has not obtained a license from the automobile manufacturer.
